title: Hello!!
description: I'm a freelance developer based in Salerno, Italy. I build fast, accessible, and user-friendly web apps, adding thoughtful design touches with a pragmatic and minimalist approach.
wrong_route_error: But don’t worry, it’s probably not your fault. Try going back, refreshing the page, or just blame JavaScript. That’s what I usually do, and it works 30% of the time.
